statements.quote: Claims that [#GrahamCassidy](https://twitter.com/hashtag/GrahamCassidy?src=hash)-Heller-Johnson doesn't cover **pre-existing** conditions -- [#FakeNews](https://twitter.com/hashtag/FakeNews?src=hash) on steroids!
